summary: The module provides comprehensive unit and integration tests for the Stable Diffusion Attend-and-Excite pipeline, checking component initialization, inference consistency, batch processing, scheduler dimensions, CPU offloading, model saving/loading, and correct operation in halfâ€‘precision (FP16) mode.
business_intent: Validate the correctness, stability, and performance of the Attend-and-Excite diffusion pipeline to guarantee reliable image generation in production and research environments.
